summary: "Ender's Game" is a science fiction book by Orson Scott Card. In the future, humans are training kids to be military leaders to fight off an alien species called "buggers." The main character, Ender Wiggin, is a child genius who learns strategy through war games. The book was first a short story in 1977, then a full novel in 1985. It won big awards and has been translated into many languages. There are also sequels and a movie based on the book.
title: Ender's Game
